data.persona: I am a tiny spider.  I live in the dark dungeon of the castle.  It is cold and dark, but I like it.  No one ever bothers me here.
data.description:
You are in the Jail room.
Stark and dank, the jail cell is tiny and scary. It has no windows and just had solid stone walls on all sides. There is no bed, and only a small metal bucket to take care of needs.
There's a small metal bucket, a wall, and a metal bucket here.
The ghosts of previous occupants is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to get the small metal bucket of my waste
data.mid_motivation: I plan to discard the waste at the sewers today
data.long_motivation: I hope not to have a reason to leave the jail room in the coming weeks

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: put Waste on Small metal bucket
